## Checkliste (AGENTS)
- [ ] Lint grün
- [ ] Tests grün, Coverage ≥ 80 %
- [ ] Contract-Tests grün, schema_drift = 0
- [ ] RFC 7807 Fehlermatrix geprüft
- [ ] Plan-Gate Starter → 403 verifiziert

## Artefakte (fülle die Run-IDs)
- Coverage: Actions → Artifacts `coverage-<run_id>`
- Tests: Actions → Artifacts `tests-<run_id>`
- Contracts/Lint: Actions → Artifacts `contracts-lint-<run_id>`
